title: Google Ads Expert
job_overview:
Are you ready to harness data and craft campaigns that resonate? At The Cultivator, we shape Google Ads into engines of growth. We treat each campaign as a craft, sculpting every bid and keyword until it sings.

We also have team managers based in the Philippines, so you can speak in Tagalog if you would like!

NOTE: Please submit your CV via the following link so we can review it ASAP, if you are passionate and dedicated, we would love to work with you asap: thecultivator.co/applynow

Who we are
The Cultivator is a marketing agency focused on lead generation and e-commerce growth. We power campaigns that deliver results without gimmicks or fancy jargon and focus on reliable performance.

Your mission
You will design, launch, and optimize Google Ads accounts that drive real outcomes. You’ll speak English with confidence, translate metrics into clear strategies, and work hand in glove with our strategists.

What you’ll own
Planning and launching search, shopping, and display campaigns aligned with client goals
Diving into analytics to uncover trends and pivot strategies based on data
Writing ad copy that grabs attention and compels action
Managing budgets and bids to maximise return on ad spend
Creating straightforward reports that tell the story behind the numbers
Collaborating with the team to integrate ads into wider marketing plans

What you bring
Proven track record running Google Ads for e-commerce or service clients
Strong command of English in both writing and conversation
Analytical mindset with a focus on real-world impact
Experience with Google Ads Editor, Analytics, and spreadsheet tools
Self-motivation and dependability, ready to own your campaigns end to end

Bonus if you’ve worked with GoHighLevel or a similar CRM/automation platform

What we offer
A seat in a fast-moving agency where your work makes a visible difference
Clear paths for skill development and leadership growth
Flexible work arrangements and a supportive team culture
Compensation that rewards your expertise and results

NOTE: Please submit your CV via the following link so we can review it ASAP, if you are passionate and dedicated, we would love to work with you asap: thecultivator.co/applynow
